pieces.title: Dollywood
pieces.description: New site build of large scale e-commerce and marketing site for Herschend Family Entertainment. Site includes multiple theme park properties designed to use the same platform and code base.
pieces.natureOfContributions: Designed and built initial front-end site; designed the site architecture to support many sites being built on the same platform while maintaining unique branding needs for each independent site; built interactive and animated components; maintained automated build taskrunners; worked directly with client representative to ensure their needs and satisfaction were met; collaborated with UX and design team mates to improve site usability and overall quality; worked with team in India to integrate front-end build into Sitecore CMS.

pieces.title: FultonCountyGA.gov
pieces.description: New public-facing web site build for the Fulton Country local government body.
pieces.natureOfContributions: Responsible for front-end build from static designs into well-structured, maintainable, and functional site; worked with back-end devs to integrate front-end build into the Sitecore CMS; led junior developers in building new front-end components and assisted with their back-end and CMS related questions while removing technical roadblocks.
